name: Wheelchair Tester
description:
You are a tester at a high-tech company, responsible for testing a newly developed accelerator designed specifically for wheelchairs!

This accelerator has been modified from a jet engine and can unleash a maximum power of 10,000 horsepower. Additionally, it utilizes hydrogen gas as its energy source, so you don't need to worry about environmental concerns.

While this accelerator boasts exceptional performance, it might still have some limitations when facing various real-world scenarios. Your task is to operate this wheelchair equipped with the accelerator, subjecting it to tests in different everyday environments. Your goal is to prove that it's a mature product, ensuring its eventual mass production.
